Metadata.Title: CVE-2009-5063 affecting package syslinux for versions less than libpng-1.2.39
Metadata.Description: CVE-2009-5063 affecting package syslinux for versions less than libpng-1.2.39. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package syslinux is earlier than libpng-1.2.39, affected by CVE-2009-5063
